summary: Initial an upload video process, this API will return the corresponding UploadID
description: Initial an upload video process, this API will return the corresponding UploadID

query.name: fileName
query.description: local filename, should be less than 20 chars

query.name: fileBytes
query.description: video file's bytes, should be less than 100M

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/content/mcn/video/block/create')
request.add_api_parameter("kolUserId", "123456")
request.add_api_parameter("fileName", "mountain.mp4")
request.add_api_parameter("fileBytes", "6310731")
response = client.execute(request)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/content/mcn/video/block/create')
request.add_api_param('kolUserId', '123456')
request.add_api_param('fileName', 'mountain.mp4')
request.add_api_param('fileBytes', '6310731')
response = client.execute(request)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
